doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Douglas P Lobo
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: The Variable Man by Douglas P. Lobo

main.head: The Variable Man
main.p: Douglas P. Lobo is a self-taught digital artist from Brazil who is passionate about creating through the mediums of drawing, painting, game design, filmmaking, and writing. His works are mainly generated through the lenses of otherworldly fantasy and science fiction genres, being mostly a channel to the combination of a range of cultural references.
